tool_description: The function of this API is to retrieve information on financial summaries, stocks, quotes, top performers, and other related data, which can then be utilized to develop a financial website or application.
name: YH Finance
title: YH Finance

api_list.name: stock/get_earnings_per_share

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\"AAPL\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following is allowed
US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|S

api_list.name: stock/get_stock_historical_price_data
api_list.description: This method will pull historical pricing data for stocks, currencies, ETFs, mutual funds, U.S. Treasuries, cryptocurrencies, commodities, and indexes.

required_parameters.name: end_date
required_parameters.description: end_date should be entered in the 'YYYY-MM-DD' format and is the last day that data will be pulled for.

required_parameters.name: time_interval
required_parameters.description: time_interval can be either 'daily', 'weekly', or 'monthly'

required_parameters.name: start_date
required_parameters.description: start_date should be entered in the 'YYYY-MM-DD' format and is the first day that data will be pulled for.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\\\\\\"AAPL\\\\\\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\"AAPL\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following is allowed
US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|S

api_list.name: stock/get_financial_stmts

required_parameters.name: statement_type
required_parameters.description: statement_type can be 'income', 'balance', 'cash' or a list of several.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\"AAPL\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

required_parameters.name: frequency
required_parameters.description: frequency can be either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following is allowed
US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|S

api_list.name: stock/get_summary
api_list.description: Returns financial summary data for cryptocurrencies, stocks, currencies, ETFs, mutual funds, U.S. Treasuries, commodity futures, and indexes.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Ticker Symbol   ( Ex. \\\\\\\"AAPL\\\\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following is allowed 
US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|S
